CHAT.comment: BETTY E. VADEN, Petitioner v. DISCOVER BANK, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DANIEL R. ORTIZ ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DANIEL R. ORTIZ ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
